text: Ugo Ceresa (born February 5, 1915 in Casale Monferrato) was an Italian professional football player. He played for 5 seasons (71 games) in the Serie A for U.S. Alessandria Calcio 1912 and A.S. Roma. ==External links== Category:1915 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Casale F.B.C. players Category:U.S. Alessandria Calcio 1912 players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:S.P.A.L. players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Ugo Ceresa
